Description: I am selling a used Godin LG HB Electric Guitar. It was assembled in the USA with Canadian parts. I've been the only owner and I bought it in 2008. The guitar has very light wear and has been taken care of. It has a super wide range of tones thanks to the 5-way switch and tone control. The frets are in really good condition, too. I am a bass player and just used this guitar for fun sometimes. The nice original Godin gig bag that came with the guitar is included. From Original Listing When I bought it: Description: The classic Godin LG now features gorgeous Premium Grade Figured Flame Maple tops and cream binding. The LG HB Flame combines a 24 3/4-inch scale, mahogany neck and a solid mahogany string through body design to deliver serious tone! The LG HB Flame houses Godin Nitro Humbuckers and a 5-way switch enabling you to not only split the coils in position 2 and 4, but also access both Humbuckers simultaneously in the third position. From hard rock, dirty blues to smooth creamy sustain...be sure to check out the LG HB Flame Specifications: - Honduras Mahogany Neck- Rosewood Fingerboard- Honduras Mahogany Body with Cream Binding- Premium Grade Figured Flame Maple top- Trans Black Flame color- 16in fingerboard radius- 24 3/4in scale- 1 11/16" nut width- 2x Godin Humbucker pickups- 5-way switch, 1x volume, 1x tone- Schaller Bridge
Title: Godin LG HB Flame Electric Guitar | Black Flame Color | Rosewood Fingerboard
